The president: s claim that "the only impact of the health care law for people with insurance is that their insurance is stronger, better, and more secure than it was before" was made during a White House news conference on April 30, 2013.
The expert: s verdict highlighted that more than 20 provisions of the Affordable Care Act have yet to take effect, raising questions about whether the claim applies to all individuals with health insurance.
The expert noted that the claim specific: 85 to 90 percent of Americans who already have health insurance," indicating that the impact may not be applicable to the remaining percentage without insurance.
